publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-746 Jackson Carlaw: Parking Charges at NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde Hospitals—That the Parliament believes that parking charges at the Victoria Infirmary, Western Infirmary, Gartnavel hospitals and Glasgow Royal Infirmary should be phased out as a matter of urgency.

S3M-746 Jackson Carlaw: Parking Charges at NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde Hospitals—That the Parliament believes that parking charges at the Victoria Infirmary, Western Infirmary, Gartnavel hospitals and Glasgow Royal Infirmary should be phased out as a matter of urgency.
